Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.utils

Class ConnectionStatusHandler

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.network.utils.ConnectionStatusHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientConnectionStatusHandler, ServerConnectionStatusHandler
public abstract class ConnectionStatusHandler extends Thread
Abstract class of an object which handles the status of the connection (rage-quits, ping failures, casual network errors included).

  • Nested Class Summary

    The timeout delay to wait between sending a ping and receiving a pong (vice-versa for the client) before running a PingTimeoutExceededTask which will close the connection.

  • Field Details

    • PING_TIMEOUT_DELAY

      protected final int PING_TIMEOUT_DELAY
      The timeout delay to wait between sending a ping and receiving a pong (vice-versa for the client) before running a PingTimeoutExceededTask which will close the connection.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • kill

      public abstract void kill()
      Kills the connection by setting false the attribute connectionActive

      If connectionActive is false, then a call to isConnectionActive (always called by the client and server before reading or sending a new message) will return false, so the client/server will be closed.

    • isConnectionActive

      public abstract boolean isConnectionActive()
      Returns whether the connection is still alive or not.
      Returns:
      true if the connection is alive, false otherwise.

    • abortConnection

      public abstract void abortConnection()
      Effectively closes the connection with the counterpart when the timeout is exceeded.
